channel.title: Apple on Nick Cobb
channel.description: Recent content in Apple on Nick Cobb

item.title: Centering GMSMapView on User's Current Location - Google Maps SDK for iOS
item.description: I’m working on a personal project that involves the use of the Google Maps SDK for iOS. As I am still picking up various tidbits and skills related to iOS development, I did a bit of learning first in order to get started. Code School recently opened up a free channel for learning about using Google Maps SDK for iOS, and that has been pretty helpful. According to the Google Maps SDK documentation, there are various ways to create a mapView and assign its camera position, or force a camera update.
